original_text: This, the first of his signs, Jesus did at Cana in Galilee, and manifested his glory. And his disciples believed in him.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 첫 표적을 갈릴리 가나에서 행하여 그의 영광을 나타내시매 제자들이 그를 믿으니라

sentences.original_text: This was the first of his signs.
Jesus did this at Cana in Galilee.
And his disciples believed in him.
